dishes.Name: Biryani
dishes.Recipe: Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt, cook rice with spices, layer chicken and rice, cook until flavors are combined.

dishes.Name: Masala Dosa
dishes.Recipe: Soak and ferment rice and dal batter, make thin crepes, fill with spiced potato filling, serve with chutney.

dishes.Name: Butter Chicken
dishes.Recipe: Cook chicken in a creamy tomato sauce with spices, serve with naan or rice.

dishes.Name: Paneer Tikka
dishes.Recipe: Marinate paneer and vegetables in spiced yogurt, grill or bake, serve with chutney.

dishes.Name: Chole Bhature
dishes.Recipe: Cook chickpeas with spices to make chole, prepare and fry fluffy bhature, serve together.

dishes.Name: Jollof Rice
dishes.Recipe: Cook rice in a tomato and pepper-based sauce with spices, add chicken if desired.

dishes.Name: Egusi Soup
dishes.Recipe: Cook egusi seeds with meat and vegetables in a spiced palm oil sauce, serve with pounded yam.

dishes.Name: Suya
dishes.Recipe: Season meat with ground peanuts and spices, grill, and serve with sliced onions.

dishes.Name: Moi Moi
dishes.Recipe: Blend beans and vegetables, steam until set, serve as a side dish or snack.

dishes.Name: Pounded Yam and Egusi
dishes.Recipe: Pound boiled yam until smooth, cook egusi soup with meat and vegetables, serve together.

dishes.Name: Momo
dishes.Recipe: Fill dumpling wrappers with spiced meat or vegetable filling, steam or fry, serve with dipping sauce.

dishes.Name: Dal Bhat
dishes.Recipe: Cook lentils with spices to make dal, serve with rice and vegetable side dishes.

dishes.Name: Thukpa
dishes.Recipe: Cook noodles in a spiced broth with chicken or vegetables, garnish with green onions.

dishes.Name: Sel Roti
dishes.Recipe: Mix rice flour with sugar and milk to make a batter, deep fry in rings until golden brown.

dishes.Name: Gundruk
dishes.Recipe: Ferment mustard greens with salt, dry in the sun, serve as a side dish or with rice.
